item.title: Writing in the Open
item.author: Noah Jacobus
item.description:
Well hello there, new friend. This blog may not look like much yet, but I wanted to get a space set up sooner rather than later for my forthcoming thoughts. And while the paint may change, the bones will stay the same—so why not go ahead and move in?

Some potential posts coming down the pipe:

  • “Job Awesome” (reflections on one year at Font Awesome)
  • “Fundamentals of Icon Design v2” (cleaned-up writing, new visual examples, dropping the MetaLab project narrative framing)
  • “Clicksy Business” (getting into the mechanical keyboard hobby)
  • “We Got the Chunk” (the ups, downs, and more ups of making and maintaining Chunk icons)

Anything else you’d like to hear about? Gimme a hearty shout on The Bird or The Elephant.
